text: (napiye!) Ivai(yellam) maraivanavarril ninrumulla visayankalakum; ivarrai nam umakku vahi mulam arivikkinrom;. Melum, maryam yar poruppil irukka ventumenpataip parri (kuri parttariya) tankal elutu kolkalai avarkal erinta potu nir avarkalutan irukkavillai. (Itaipparri) avarkal vivatitta potum nir avarkalutan irukkavillai
